about_the_game:
This game requires Oculus Quest. If you do not have the device, you cannot use it.

You become a member of the rift investigation team and explore the unknown rift.
Collect dinosaur eggs while avoiding the dangerous dinosaurs there.
You can hatch dinosaur eggs to create your own dinosaur garden.

You can explore jungle, desert, and swamp areas.

Use capture bullets to collect resources and dinosaur eggs.

Dinosaurs can't see you, but they react to moving objects or sounds.

You can use lures, flashes, and smoke bombs to escape dangerous situations or make gathering easier.

Collect points to get upgraded and enjoy a great vacation!!

This game requires Oculus Quest. If you do not have the device, you cannot use it.

You become a member of the rift investigation team and explore the unknown rift.

Collect points to get upgraded and enjoy a great vacation!!

name: Scavenger vr

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-7500, AMD Ryzen 5 1600 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 2060 3GB, AMD Radeon RX 5600 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-8600k or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing Only

short_description: An unknown crack resembling the Mesozoic Era discovered in the near future. Collect dinosaur eggs while avoiding the eyes of dangerous dinosaurs. Collect dinosaur eggs and hatch them to collect dinosaurs!! Collect points to get upgraded and enjoy a great vacation!!
